revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> Below is the list of the Roles you can get in the official Pokeclicker Discord server. Any cells with a "---" you don't need to worry about.
<!--T:2--> {| class="wikitable sortable" ! scope="col" | Role || scope="col"| Color || scope=''col'' | Use || scope="col" | How to get |- | style="text-align:right" | Auto Reminder || Grey || Sends a DM when your /daily or /timely streak is ready to be claimed || rowspan=4|Use /roles on discord |- | style="text-align:right" | Happy Hour || Grey || Pings you for the Happy Hour in Bot-Coins |- | style="text-align:right" | Bot Updates || Grey || Pings you when the Discord Bot had a Update |- | style="text-align:right" | Game Updates || Grey || Pings you when Pokéclicker has a new Update |- | style="text-align:right" | Poké Squad || Purple || 20% Bonus money from the !claim and !timely commands || 2,500 {{Pdollar}} |- | style="text-align:right" | 100k Club Role || Yellow || Gives you a cool Yellow name || 100,000 {{Pdollar}} |- | style="text-align:right" | Poke Crew || Red || Primarily a Beta testing role, gives access to hidden Crew channels || Being a responsible and active member in the Discord for a sufficient/substantial amount of time |- | style="text-align:right" | Wiki Contributor || Green || Gives access to hidden Wiki Channels || Fulfilling the requisites outlined in the Wiki-Readme (located) on Discord |- | style="text-align:right" | Code Contributor || Blue || --- || Helping with the development of Pokéclicker, primarily by Contributing Code |- | style="text-align:right" | Poké Master || Pink || 50% Bonus money from the !claim and !timely commands || Boosting the Server |- | style="text-align:right" | Wiki Moderator || Light Green || --- || --- |- | style="text-align:right" | Moderator || Reddish Brown || --- || --- |- | style="text-align:right" | Developer || Light Blue || --- || --- |- |}
<!--T:3--> [[Category:Discord]] </translate>
